title: Data Retention Policy
description: All customer data must be retained for 7 years as per regulatory compliance.

title: Database Backup Procedure
description: Daily backups run at 2 AM UTC. Full backup on Sunday, incremental on weekdays.

title: How to reset user password
description: Admin users can reset passwords via Admin Console.

title: API Rate Limits
description: REST API rate limit is 1000 requests per minute per API key.

title: Production Outage - Jan 2024
description: Root cause: Database connection pool exhaustion.
